messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE FILE: #G-7896-KL DATE: 06/03/26  On the evening of June 3, a mysterious fire erupted at the city's historical museum. Though no casualties were reported, several irreplaceable artifacts were damaged. The subsequent investigation unveiled potential foul play, and a special task force was assigned to get to the bottom of the incident.  LAW ENFORCEMENT RESPONSE:  INITIAL RESPONSE: Patrol Officer P. Q. R. Wallace was the first responder on the scene, immediately requesting backup and ensuring the area's evacuation. FIRE INVESTIGATION: Detective S. T. U. Ramirez, with expertise in arson investigations, began looking into the fire's origin and potential accelerants. EVIDENCE COLLECTION: Technician V. W. X. Brooks carefully collected and catalogued charred materials, which would later be sent for chemical analysis. WITNESS INTERVIEWS: Sergeant Y. Z. A. Fletcher conducted interviews with museum staff and visitors present at the time of the incident, gathering critical testimony. SECURITY FOOTAGE: Lieutenant B. C. D. Torres collaborated with museum security to retrieve and review CCTV footage from the evening of the fire. PUBLIC STATEMENTS: Officer E. F. G. Myers held press briefings, addressing public concerns and assuring that the matter was under thorough investigation. Detective Ramirez's insights suggested the possibility of arson. Officer Wallace's prompt actions ensured safety and containment. Technician Brooks's evidence gathering would prove crucial in the chemical analysis stage. Sgt. Fletcher gathered crucial witness testimonies that hinted at suspicious activity. Lt. Torres unearthed revealing footage, while Officer Myers kept the public informed and calm.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
